vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἄννας, -α (FlJ, Ἄνανος, -ου), ὁ (Heb. חָנַן),
Annas, the high priest: Luk.3:2, Jhn.18:13-24, Act.4:6.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Luk.3.2;
father in law of Caiaphas (G2533H)
§ Annas, "grace"
Annas, (Proper name), short version of Ἄνανας, Lk. 3:2; Jn. 18:13, 24; Acts 4:6*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞那 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "謙卑"
猶太人的大祭司
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚那 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "谦卑"
犹太人的大祭司
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: An-ne hoặc An-nát « Đức Giê-hô-va đã tỏ ân điển », là thầy cả thượng phẩm. H2608
